channel.title: How to i add wepons iv made attack like other wepons?
channel.description: iv made some whips cuz i saw a post for metal whips so i thought ill mkae some off my own how do i add them to server so they attack like other whip cuz i wild them and when i attack they punch lol not like a whip how do i add them...

item.title: How to i add wepons iv made attack like other wepons?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.source: How to i add wepons iv made attack like other wepons?

item.title: How to i add wepons iv made attack like other wepons?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:2, topic:163373”]Search for public int GetWepAnim() and under add this
change the ITEMID to the metal whip id
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ITEMID)
{
return 2661;
}[/quote]

search in item.java for the animation

Read full topic
item.source: How to i add wepons iv made attack like other wepons?

item.title: How to i add wepons iv made attack like other wepons?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Search for public int GetWepAnim() and under add this
change the ITEMID to the metal whip id
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ITEMID)
{
return 2661;
}
